name: Avatar
description: Avatar component for displaying user profile pictures or initials. Extends MUI Avatar with custom styling and optional online status badge.

props.name: alt
props.description: Alt text for the avatar image

props.name: children
props.description: Initials or text to display when no image is provided

examples.title: With Image
examples.code:
import { Avatar } from '@/components';

<Avatar src="/path/to/image.jpg" alt="John Doe" size="40px" />

migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI Avatar with design system Avatar. Note the size prop uses pixel strings instead of sx prop.

accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Alt text is announced for image avatars, initials text is read for text avatars

whenNotToUse: For decorative images (use img or Icon instead)
bestPractices: Always provide alt text or meaningful children
Use consistent sizes within the same context
Use badge prop to indicate online status
